scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consist of a letter from Fawcett, London, writing to H. W. Fay enclosing his photograph and asking for one of Abraham Lincoln in return.
With the letter is an autographed cabinet photograph of Fawcett, 1898 December 11, taken by M. Batiste & Son, Oxford Street.
